title: Rough and blocky
content:
Any idea of what this font is? Thank you for any help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [figfont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405004411/http:/typophile.com/files/figfont.jpg) | 24.62 KB |
author: TCD

comments.content: 2 different /L and 2 different /E, most probably hand-drawn...

It looks close enough to **[Vipnagorgialla](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405004411/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Vipnagorgialla%20-%20Regular&fid=aca02b05c6bdb2d23f2efbcdb5c95191&fsize=60&text=RELLES%20F&fit=1)** free font by Ray Larabie [1998, Typodermic]
THANK YOU BOTH!!! You made my day that much easier. KDL
